text:
Hello,
My name is Alex Dupont, I'm 20 years old. I live in Paris since 2 weeks for my studies. Before, i lived in Paris.
I was in a BTEC International trade and i had the graduation. It was a good experience and i had the chance of make a practices in overseas. It was in Paris during 2 months in a company of teeth care and i was my best experience. Therefor i don't see me work in trade, in a company and forward a computer. The negociation with consumers feel me stress out.
Now i'm in the sciences of education in Rennes 2 because i want to work in social and in particulary with children such as teacher in elementary or nursery school. This orientation look like me and I feel fine because i like help others and i would like to participate of the formation of future citizens.
During my studies in Paris when i was in secondary school, i saw the work of teacher in a nursery school in 2019 during a practice of 1 month. It was in Saint julien school in Paris. First, i feel shy but after i feel good and relaxed. I meet the teacher of this classe and she was an inspiration, she explained me the work of teacher.
